meanings.sent1: He saved up all his louies to buy a new bike.
meanings.sent2: She earned a lot of louies from her summer job.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was overflowing with shiny louies.
meanings.sent4: In his dream, the louies turned into falling leaves.
meanings.sent5: The louies jingled in his pocket as he walked.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a type of dance move.
meanings.sent1: She impressed everyone with her smooth louies on the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: The dance crew practiced their louies until they were perfect.
meanings.sent3: His louies were so funky that even the cat started dancing.
meanings.sent4: The louies she performed were like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The louies added a touch of magic to the routine.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a type of fish.
meanings.sent1: The fishermen caught a big louies in the river.
meanings.sent2: The louies was delicious when grilled with lemon.
meanings.sent3: The louies in the tank seemed to be having a conversation.
meanings.sent4: The louies swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent5: The louies had vibrant scales that shimmered in the sunlight.
